data.message: I need to be contacted to report in inappropriate messages BC no one is helping!! And it wouldn't let me do what I wanted through the report thing but trust and believe you'll want this creep of Facebook and not communicating with kids and d sending nasty pictures or trying, the authorities will have to know its very important!!

replies.message: Hi Courtney. Our Family Safety Center contains information, tools and resources to help you stay safe online: http://bit.ly/2fFACLR. Also, if you see something on Facebook that may violate the Facebook Terms, please report it to us at: http://bit.ly/2gPCGFY. -Joe
You need to report this person to your police.  Facebook isn't the police and they will not report them.   If you want something done about it you must do it yourself
But I wanted other people to know who he is not to add him etc and for them to shut down his page he's a creep
Katie Henry fb has their police that they need to report these type of people too and their pages need to be shut down this is fb and fb should take care of these things not our local police

If its continuous threats and people finding your address or knowing you from high school and stalking you its a police matter  or if its of taking children's pictures etc there are certain things that need to be reported
